title: Chocolate cracked biscuits
ingredients: ['180g dark chocolate, chopped', '60g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '2 eggs', '120g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '190g plain flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'icing sugar, for dusting']
